featuresSection.heading: Explore Diverse 3BHK Configurations and Layouts in Sector 60 Gurugram
description: The properties available for a 3BHK flat for sale in Sector 60 offer unparalleled architectural variety. We understand that every family has unique requirements, which is why our inventory spans multiple configurations, ranging from efficient luxury units to expansive penthouse-style layouts. These homes are designed keeping contemporary living standards in mind, ensuring maximum utility and aesthetic appeal across all square footage options.

Finding the ideal space is crucial for long-term comfort. Our specialized offerings include flats with dedicated servant quarters, optimized corner units providing three-side open advantages, and Vastu-compliant layouts. Browse the key configurations below to identify the perfect setting for your new life in Sector 60 Gurugram, a location synonymous with prosperity and high quality of life.

features.title: Standard Luxury 3BHK Layout
features.description: These well-planned units prioritize efficient space utilization and functional design. Typically featuring three bedrooms, an attached balcony, a spacious living-dining area, and modular kitchen facilities. Ideal for small to medium families seeking modern comfort without compromising on location or quality. These apartments offer excellent value in the Sector 60 market.

features.title: 3BHK Plus Servant Room
features.description: Perfect for larger families or those requiring dedicated domestic assistance. This configuration includes an additional room and separate bathroom, usually located near the utility or kitchen area, providing privacy for both residents and staff. This premium feature enhances the overall functionality of the 3BHK flat for sale in Sector 60 Gurugram.

features.title: Expansive Corner 3BHK Unit
features.description: Corner flats are highly desirable due to increased privacy, better natural light exposure, and superior cross-ventilation. Often featuring larger wrap-around balconies offering panoramic views of the landscaped surroundings. These units represent a premium investment choice ensuring a brighter and more spacious living environment in Sector 60.

features.title: Optimized Vastu Compliant Flats
features.description: For buyers prioritizing traditional Indian architectural principles, we offer layouts meticulously designed according to Vastu Shastra guidelines. These homes promote positive energy flow, ensuring peace, prosperity, and good health for the occupants. This specific focus on design makes these 3BHK apartments highly sought after.

Ready-to-move 3BHK flats in Sector 60 allow immediate possession, eliminating rental costs and construction uncertainties. faqSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions About Buying a 3BHK Flat in Sector 60 Gurugram
faqSection.description: Get all your queries answered regarding property options, legal formalities, pricing trends, and lifestyle benefits associated with purchasing a residential 3BHK flat in the premium location of Sector 60 Gurugram.

faqs.question: What is the typical size range for a 3BHK flat for sale in Sector 60 Gurugram
faqs.answer: The sizes of 3BHK units in Sector 60 vary significantly depending on the project type luxury or ultra-luxury and the specific configuration. Generally, you can expect the carpet area to range between 1500 square feet to over 2500 square feet. Standard layouts usually fall around 1800 square feet offering three large bedrooms, three bathrooms, a utility space, and spacious balconies. Premium projects might include configurations up to 3000 square feet if they incorporate a large servant room, a powder room, or exclusive double-height living areas. Always confirm the RERA-specified carpet area before making a purchase decision.

faqs.question: Is Sector 60 Gurugram considered a good investment location for residential property
faqs.answer: Yes Sector 60 is regarded as one of Gurugram's most promising real estate investment destinations especially along the Golf Course Extension Road. Its proximity to major corporate offices, excellent social infrastructure, and controlled density development ensures consistent high demand. Furthermore, the presence of Grade A developers guarantees quality construction which contributes positively to long-term capital appreciation. Rental yields for premium 3BHK flats are also competitive due to the influx of high-income professionals working in nearby commercial zones.

faqs.question: What are the major connectivity benefits when living in Sector 60
faqs.answer: Sector 60 offers outstanding connectivity. It is centrally located on the Golf Course Extension Road providing direct access to NH-48 and the Southern Peripheral Road SPR. This facilitates easy travel to Delhi and other parts of the NCR. The nearest Rapid Metro stations like Sector 55/56 are just a short drive away ensuring seamless public transport access. Furthermore, the recent infrastructure improvements have streamlined traffic flow making daily commuting to Cyber City, Sohna Road, and IGI Airport significantly faster and more predictable.

faqs.question: What kind of amenities can I expect when purchasing a 3BHK flat in this sector
faqs.answer: Luxury residential projects offering a 3BHK flat for sale in Sector 60 are typically packed with high-end amenities designed for comfortable urban living. Standard offerings include multi-level clubhouses with facilities such as fully equipped gyms, yoga studios, and indoor games rooms. Outdoor amenities usually comprise large swimming pools, dedicated kids' play zones, jogging tracks, maintained gardens, and courts for sports like tennis or basketball. Most modern societies also feature power backup for 100% load, advanced three-tier security systems, and robust maintenance services.

faqs.question: Are there any ready-to-move-in 3BHK options available in Sector 60 Gurugram
faqs.answer: Yes Sector 60 has a robust supply of ready-to-move-in 3BHK apartments across various housing societies. Buying a ready property provides the immediate benefit of avoiding project completion risk and uncertainty. It also allows the buyer to physically inspect the final quality of construction, fixtures, and fittings before payment. We maintain an updated inventory of verified ready-to-move 3BHK flats ensuring immediate possession upon completion of legal and financial formalities.

faqs.question: What are the typical price brackets for a premium 3BHK flat in Sector 60
faqs.answer: Pricing in Sector 60 depends heavily on the project's brand name, construction status, size, and the floor level. Generally, a mid-segment 3BHK flat might start from around 2.5 Crore INR and go up significantly. Ultra-luxury or penthouse-style 3BHK units with exclusive features like private lifts or terrace gardens can command prices upward of 4.5 Crore INR or more. It is essential to factor in additional costs such as GST, stamp duty, registration fees, and internal development charges IDC which can add approximately 8 to 12 percent to the base price.

faqs.question: Do these projects offer good rental income potential for investors
faqs.answer: Absolutely. Given Sector 60's proximity to major IT and business parks along Golf Course Extension Road, there is constant demand from high-salaried expatriates and corporate professionals looking for quality housing. A well-maintained and modern 3BHK flat in this sector can generate substantial rental income, often yielding between 3 to 4 percent annually, making it a lucrative option for passive income generation. The rentability factor is very high here.

faqs.question: How does the infrastructure in Sector 60 support family living
faqs.answer: Sector 60 is specifically planned for high-quality family living. It offers wide, well-maintained internal roads, reliable water and electricity supply, and excellent waste management systems. The area is close to renowned educational institutions like DPS International and St. Xavierâ€™s High School. Furthermore, numerous parks, multiplexes, and retail centers ensure that all recreational and daily needs of a family are easily met within the neighborhood.

faqs.question: What legal documents should I verify before purchasing a 3BHK flat
faqs.answer: A buyer must prioritize verifying several crucial documents to ensure a safe transaction. Key documents include the Developer's RERA registration number for the project, the Occupancy Certificate OC for ready-to-move properties, the Commencement Certificate CC for under-construction units, the title deed verifying ownership, and the approved building plan. It is highly recommended to engage a legal expert specializing in Gurugram real estate to review all documents thoroughly.

faqs.question: Are 3BHK flats in Sector 60 generally compliant with Vastu Shastra principles
faqs.answer: Many leading developers are increasingly incorporating Vastu Shastra principles into the design and layout of their premium 3BHK flats to meet buyer preferences. While not every unit is strictly Vastu compliant, numerous options are specifically marketed as such, featuring ideal directions for the main entrance, kitchen placement, and bedroom orientation. If Vastu compliance is a priority for you, our team can filter properties specifically designed to meet these traditional requirements.
